improvement_suggestions: Explicitly mention experience with AI-based system development in the resume's experience section. Quantify the impact of any AI-related projects.

Incorporate the keywords 'Recommendation letter writing,' 'Document formatting,' 'File / error checking,' and 'Document naming' into the resume, especially if the candidate has relevant experience, even if not explicitly AI-focused.
Add a line in the summary or skills section indicating willingness or experience with remote/hybrid work environments.
Highlight any projects where you automated tasks or processes, as this aligns with the job's focus on automating compliance and administrative services with AI.
Consider adding a brief project or personal interest section to showcase AI projects, even if they are academic or personal projects.
